Classes/DeviceInfoAccessor.html.abstract: DeviceInfoAccessor is used to access info related to the device.

Classes/ExpandableGalleryView.html.name: ExpandableGalleryView
Classes/ExpandableGalleryView.html.abstract: ExpandableGalleryView is a horizontal sliding image page view, which has full screen mode. If the navigation bar is translucent, GalleryView should be put inside a ScrollView.

Classes/GalleryView.html.name: GalleryView
Classes/GalleryView.html.abstract: GalleryView is used to display a list of images. If the navigation bar is translucent, GalleryView should be put inside a ScrollView.

Classes/ImagePickerHelper.html.name: ImagePickerHelper
Classes/ImagePickerHelper.html.abstract: ImagePickerHelper is used to select an image in the image library or using the camera.

Classes/KeyboardHelper.html.name: KeyboardHelper
Classes/KeyboardHelper.html.abstract: KeyboarHelper is used to optimize the soft keyboard performance.

Classes/InfiniteCell.html.name: InfiniteCell
Classes/InfiniteCell.html.abstract: InfiniteCell is used to display one of the infinite items.

Classes/InfiniteList.html.name: InfiniteList
Classes/InfiniteList.html.abstract: InfiniteList is a list that can load infinite items.

Classes/ExpandableMapView.html.name: ExpandableMapView
Classes/ExpandableMapView.html.abstract: ExpandableMapView is used to add full screen function to the map view.

Classes/MapViewPoint.html.name: MapViewPoint

Classes/CustomizedMessageHelper.html.name: CustomizedMessageHelper
Classes/CustomizedMessageHelper.html.abstract: CustomizedMessageHelper is used to display a customized message on the screen.

Classes/SystemMessageHelper.html.name: SystemMessageHelper

Classes/BottomSheetViewController.html.name: BottomSheetViewController

Classes/ModalViewController.html.name: ModalViewController
Classes/ModalViewController.html.abstract: ModalViewController is used to present a view controller modally.

Classes/DataPicker.html.name: DataPicker
Classes/DataPicker.html.abstract: DataPicker selects a single value from a set of values.

Classes/PopupView.html.name: PopupView
Classes/PopupView.html.abstract: PopupView is used to popup a view on the screen.

Classes/RootView.html.name: RootView
Classes/RootView.html.abstract: RootView is the root view of all customized view. It provides show and hide control and initialization control.
